panels.content:
![logo image](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/marinebon/mbon-dashboard-server/client-fknms/static_files/DB_logos_Horz_FK_vNew.png)



Select a specific location using the "Locations" dropdown menu at left.

The range of the displayed time period can be adjusted at top right.
panels.title: Panel Title

targets.query:
SELECT mean("anomaly") AS anomaly FROM "viirs_chlor_a"
WHERE ("location" =~ /^$Locations$/) AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

SELECT mean("anomaly") AS anomaly FROM "modis_abi"
WHERE ("location" =~ /^$Locations$/) AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

SELECT mean("anomaly") AS anomaly FROM "viirs_sstn"
WHERE ("location" =~ /^$Locations$/) AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

SELECT mean("anomaly") AS anomaly FROM "viirs_rrs_671"
WHERE ("location" =~ /^$Locations$/) AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

panels.description:
MODIS-Aqua 1km chlor_a product (mg/m^3) binned to 7-day intervals.
Anomaly images created by subtracting 7-day climatologies made using data from 2003-2017.
panels.title: MODIS-Aqua CHLa 7-Day anomaly images (mg/m^3)
MODIS-Aqua remote sensing reflectance at 667nm 7-Day anomaly images (sr^-1)

targets.query:
SELECT mean("anomaly") AS anomaly FROM "viirs_sstn"
